entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9540] Vermögenswerte with a value of 4,132,585,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 1,317,913,000 + 2,811,714,000 ) with a value of 4,129,627,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets. The properties of this ifrs-full:Assets fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Assets : -3 Decimals of Current Assets : -3 Decimals of Non Current Assets : -3
Rule Element Id:9540 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900VXIFBHO0SW2I31/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/WienerbergerAG-2020-12-31.zip/WienerbergerAG-2020-12-31/reports/WienerbergerAG-2020-12-31.xhtml 21783

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 03 - Konzerbilanz but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Konzern-Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, wienerberger:ProfitLossThereofAttributableToHybridCapitalHolders All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 249,099,000 reported in the network role http://wienerberger.com/xbrl/2020/roles/KonzernGewinnUndVerlustrechnung should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 262,246,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://wienerberger.com/xbrl/2020/roles/EntwicklungDesKonzerneigenkapitals. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -3 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900VXIFBHO0SW2I31/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/WienerbergerAG-2020-12-31.zip/WienerbergerAG-2020-12-31/reports/WienerbergerAG-2020-12-31.xhtml 21783
